# The `GCModuleInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An analysis pass which caches information about the entire <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::GCModuleInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

An analysis pass which caches information about the entire <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a>.

Records both the function level information used by GCRoots and a cache of the &#39;active&#39; gc strategy objects for the current <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a>.

Definition at line 203 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/gcmetadata-h">GCMetadata.h</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::GCModuleInfo::FuncInfoVec =  std::vector&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;GCFunctionInfo&gt;&gt;</>}>
List of per function info objects.

In theory, Each of these may be associated with a different GC.
